children.label: children
signature: boolean | React.ReactChild | React.ReactFragment | React.ReactPortal | null | undefined

functions.label: getDisplayedColumns
description:
Function to provide fallback when
1) no columns are given
2) Just one column is given, which is the configured timefields

functions.label: getTextBasedColumnsMeta
description: Columns meta for text based searches

functions.label: UnifiedDataTable
signature: ({ ariaLabelledBy, columns, columnsMeta, showColumnTokens, configHeaderRowHeight, headerRowHeightState, onUpdateHeaderRowHeight, controlColumnIds, dataView, loadingState, onFilter, onResize, onSetColumns, onSort, rows, searchDescription, searchTitle, settings, showTimeCol, showFullScreenButton, sort, useNewFieldsApi, isSortEnabled, isPaginationEnabled, cellActionsTriggerId, className, rowHeightState, onUpdateRowHeight, maxAllowedSampleSize, sampleSizeState, onUpdateSampleSize, isPlainRecord, rowsPerPageState, onUpdateRowsPerPage, onFieldEdited, services, renderCustomGridBody, renderCustomToolbar, trailingControlColumns, totalHits, onFetchMoreRecords, renderDocumentView, setExpandedDoc, expandedDoc, configRowHeight, showMultiFields, maxDocFieldsDisplayed, externalControlColumns, externalAdditionalControls, rowsPerPageOptions, visibleCellActions, externalCustomRenderers, consumer, componentsTourSteps, gridStyleOverride, rowLineHeightOverride, cellActionsMetadata, customGridColumnsConfiguration, customControlColumnsConfiguration, }:

children.label:
{
  ariaLabelledBy,
  columns,
  columnsMeta,
  showColumnTokens,
  configHeaderRowHeight,
  headerRowHeightState,
  onUpdateHeaderRowHeight,
  controlColumnIds = CONTROL_COLUMN_IDS_DEFAULT,
  dataView,
  loadingState,
  onFilter,
  onResize,
  onSetColumns,
  onSort,
  rows,
  searchDescription,
  searchTitle,
  settings,
  showTimeCol,
  showFullScreenButton = true,
  sort,
  useNewFieldsApi,
  isSortEnabled = true,
  isPaginationEnabled = true,
  cellActionsTriggerId,
  className,
  rowHeightState,
  onUpdateRowHeight,
  maxAllowedSampleSize,
  sampleSizeState,
  onUpdateSampleSize,
  isPlainRecord = false,
  rowsPerPageState,
  onUpdateRowsPerPage,
  onFieldEdited,
  services,
  renderCustomGridBody,
  renderCustomToolbar,
  trailingControlColumns,
  totalHits,
  onFetchMoreRecords,
  renderDocumentView,
  setExpandedDoc,
  expandedDoc,
  configRowHeight,
  showMultiFields = true,
  maxDocFieldsDisplayed = 50,
  externalControlColumns,
  externalAdditionalControls,
  rowsPerPageOptions,
  visibleCellActions,
  externalCustomRenderers,
  consumer = 'discover',
  componentsTourSteps,
  gridStyleOverride,
  rowLineHeightOverride,
  cellActionsMetadata,
  customGridColumnsConfiguration,
  customControlColumnsConfiguration,
}

signature: ({ capabilities, dataView, dataViews, setAppState, useNewFieldsApi, columns, sort, defaultOrder, }: UseColumnsProps) => { columns: string[]; onAddColumn: (columnName: string) => void; onRemoveColumn: (columnName: string) => void; onMoveColumn: (columnName: string, newIndex: number) => void; onSetColumns: (nextColumns: string[], hideTimeColumn: boolean) => void; }

{
  capabilities,

  dataViews,
  setAppState,
  useNewFieldsApi,
  columns,
  sort,
  defaultOrder = 'desc',
}

interfaces.label: UnifiedDataTableProps
description: Unified Data Table props

children.label: ariaLabelledBy
description: Determines which element labels the grid for ARIA

children.label: className
description: Optional class name to apply

children.label: columns
description: Determines ids of the columns which are displayed

children.label: columnsMeta
description:
If not provided, types will be derived by default from the dataView field types.
For displaying text-based search results, pass columns meta (which are available separately in the fetch request) down here.
Check available utils in `utils/get_columns_meta.ts`

children.label: showColumnTokens
description: Field tokens could be rendered in column header next to the field name.

children.label: configHeaderRowHeight
description: Optional value for providing configuration setting for UnifiedDataTable header row height

children.label: headerRowHeightState
description: Determines number of rows of a column header

children.label: onUpdateHeaderRowHeight
description: Update header row height state

children.label: expandedDoc
description: If set, the given document is displayed in a flyout

children.label: dataView
description: The used data view

children.label: loadingState
description: Determines if data is currently loaded

children.label: onFilter
description: Function to add a filter in the grid cell or document flyout

children.label: onResize
description: Function triggered when a column is resized by the user
signature: ((colSettings: { columnId: string; width: number; }) => void) | undefined

children.label: onSetColumns
description: Function to set all columns

children.label: onSort
description: function to change sorting of the documents, skipped when isSortEnabled is set to false

children.label: rows
description: Array of documents provided by Elasticsearch

children.label: setExpandedDoc
description: Function to set the expanded document, which is displayed in a flyout

children.label: settings
description: Grid display settings persisted in Elasticsearch (e.g. column width)

children.label: searchDescription
description: Search description

children.label: searchTitle
description: Search title

children.label: showTimeCol
description: Determines whether the time columns should be displayed (legacy settings)

children.label: showFullScreenButton
description: Determines whether the full screen button should be displayed

children.label: isSortEnabled
description: Manage user sorting control

children.label: sort
description: Current sort setting

children.label: useNewFieldsApi
description: How the data is fetched

children.label: isPaginationEnabled
description: Manage pagination control

children.label: controlColumnIds
description: List of used control columns (available: 'openDetails', 'select')

children.label: configRowHeight
description: Optional value for providing configuration setting for UnifiedDataTable row height

children.label: rowHeightState
description: Row height from state

children.label: onUpdateRowHeight
description: Update row height state

children.label: isPlainRecord
description: Is text base lang mode enabled

children.label: rowsPerPageState
description: Current state value for rowsPerPage

children.label: onUpdateRowsPerPage
description: Update rows per page state

children.label: maxAllowedSampleSize
description: Configuration option to limit sample size slider

children.label: sampleSizeState
description: The max size of the documents returned by Elasticsearch

children.label: onUpdateSampleSize
description: Update rows per page state

children.label: onFieldEdited
description: Callback to execute on edit runtime field

children.label: cellActionsTriggerId
description: Optional triggerId to retrieve the column cell actions that will override the default ones

children.label: services
description: Service dependencies

children.label: renderDocumentView
description: Callback to render DocumentView when the document is expanded

children.label: showMultiFields
description: Optional value for providing configuration setting for enabling to display the complex fields in the table. Default is true.

children.label: maxDocFieldsDisplayed
description: Optional value for providing configuration setting for maximum number of document fields to display in the table. Default is 50.

children.label: externalControlColumns
description: Optional value for providing EuiDataGridControlColumn list of the additional leading control columns. UnifiedDataTable includes two control columns: Open Details and Select.

children.label: totalHits
description: Number total hits from ES

children.label: onFetchMoreRecords
description: To fetch more

children.label: externalAdditionalControls
description: Optional value for providing the additional controls available in the UnifiedDataTable toolbar to manage it's records or state. UnifiedDataTable includes Columns, Sorting and Bulk Actions.
signature: boolean | React.ReactChild | React.ReactFragment | React.ReactPortal | null | undefined

children.label: rowsPerPageOptions
description: Optional list of number type values to set custom UnifiedDataTable paging options to display the records per page.

children.label: renderCustomGridBody
description:
An optional function called to completely customize and control the rendering of
EuiDataGrid's body and cell placement.  This can be used to, e.g. remove EuiDataGrid's
virtualization library, or roll your own.

This component is **only** meant as an escape hatch for extremely custom use cases.

Behind the scenes, this function is treated as a React component,
allowing hooks, context, and other React concepts to be used.
It receives #EuiDataGridCustomBodyProps as its only argument.

children.label: renderCustomToolbar
description: Optional render for the grid toolbar

children.label: trailingControlColumns
description: An optional list of the EuiDataGridControlColumn type for setting trailing control columns standard for EuiDataGrid.

children.label: visibleCellActions
description: An optional value for a custom number of the visible cell actions in the table. By default is up to 3.

children.label: externalCustomRenderers
description: An optional settings for a specified fields rendering like links. Applied only for the listed fields rendering.

children.label: customGridColumnsConfiguration
description: An optional settings for customising the column

children.label: customControlColumnsConfiguration
description: An optional settings to control which columns to render as trailing and leading control columns

children.label: consumer
description: Name of the UnifiedDataTable consumer component or application

children.label: componentsTourSteps
description: Optional key/value pairs to set guided onboarding steps ids for a data table components included to guided tour.

children.label: gridStyleOverride
description: Optional gridStyle override.

children.label: rowLineHeightOverride
description: Optional row line height override. Default is 1.6em.

children.label: cellActionsMetadata
description:
Custom set of properties used by some actions.
An action might require a specific set of metadata properties to render.
This data is sent directly to actions.

interfaces.label: UnifiedDataTableSettings
description: User configurable state of data grid, persisted in saved search

misc.label: DataTableColumnsMeta
description: Custom column types per column name

misc.label: ValueToStringConverter
signature: (rowIndex: number, columnId: string, options?: { compatibleWithCSV?: boolean | undefined; } | undefined) => { formattedString: string; withFormula: boolean; }

objects.label: ROWS_HEIGHT_OPTIONS
description:
Row height might be a value from -1 to 20
A value of -1 automatically adjusts the row height to fit the contents.
A value of 0 displays the content in a single line.
A value from 1 to 20 represents number of lines of Document explorer row to display.
signature: { readonly auto: -1; readonly single: 0; readonly default: 3; }
